mapper.insert: insert into alg_user (usr_sn, owner_id, usr_name, usr_code, usr_url, is_org, email, passwd, need_notify, create_date, update_date) values (#{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needNotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update alg_user set owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_name = #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_code = #{usrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_url = #{usrUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_org = #{isOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_notify = #{needNotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select usr_sn, owner_id, usr_name, usr_code, usr_url, is_org, email, passwd, need_notify, create_date, update_date from alg_user where usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select usr_sn, owner_id, usr_name, usr_code, usr_url, is_org, email, passwd, need_notify, create_date, update_date from alg_user
select usr_sn, owner_id, usr_name, usr_code, usr_url, is_org, email, passwd, need_notify, create_date, update_date from alg_user where usr_name = #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
